result.title: [Feature request] Stop auto reloading the standing page of educational round after system testing ends
result.content:
Is it needed to auto reload the standing page of an educational round after end of the system testing of that round?

Sometimes, it happens that someone is viewing something(such as source code of an user, yes, I know it is possible to view the source clicking on the '#' sign of that submission) then the standing page automatically reloads which interrupts the activity of viewing source code or something else, which is very irritant.

So, if it is not needed to automatically reload the standing page after system testing ends, please stop auto reload after system testing ends.

I am drawing attention of MikeMirzayanov in this regard.
